response.overview: Three Australians team up to do God's work of exposing the lies behind the controversies and the real truths behind the conspiracies of the public and media. Something that no one has successfully been able to achieve until now...  Is Australia fake? How did Michael Jackson really die? Find out in this ground-breaking miniseries by CBS Productions
response.tagline: THE TRUTH LIES WHERE YOU LEAST EXPECT IT
response.title: EXPOSED!
